Description: Ensures that each customer_id in tsb.customer_data_bank is unique, validating the integrity of the primary key constraint.
Custom_SQL: SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks that all records in tsb.customer_data_bank have a non-null customer_id, ensuring no missing primary key values.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_id IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the full_name column, which may indicate incomplete customer records.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE full_name IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where date_of_birth is missing, which could impact age calculations and customer profiling.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NULL

Description: Detects records with missing gender information, which may affect demographic analysis.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing address details, which are critical for customer communication and verification.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE address IS NULL

Description: Identifies records lacking phone_number, which could hinder customer contact and verification.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing email_address values, important for digital communications and notifications.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NULL

Description: Detects records missing national_id_or_passport_number, which may impact identity verification.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing occupation information, which may affect customer segmentation and profiling.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE occupation IS NULL

Description: Identifies records lacking customer_type, which could impact business rules and segmentation.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_type IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing account_numbers, which may indicate incomplete linkage to bank accounts.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers IS NULL

Description: Detects records with missing age, which may affect eligibility checks and analytics.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing created_by values, which are important for audit trails and data provenance.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_by IS NULL

Description: Identifies records missing created_on timestamp, which is critical for tracking record creation dates.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing modified_by values, important for audit and change tracking.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_by IS NULL

Description: Detects records missing modified_on timestamp, which may impact audit and change history.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing status values, which may affect customer lifecycle management.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NULL

Description: Checks for duplicate email_address values, which may indicate multiple records for the same customer.
Custom_SQL: SELECT email_address, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL GROUP BY email_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Detects duplicate national_id_or_passport_number values, which could indicate identity duplication.
Custom_SQL: SELECT national_id_or_passport_number, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NOT NULL GROUP BY national_id_or_passport_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks for duplicate phone_number values, which may indicate multiple records for the same contact.
Custom_SQL: SELECT phone_number, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL GROUP BY phone_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Ensures age values are within a reasonable range (e.g., 0 to 120), detecting outliers or data entry errors.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NOT NULL AND (age < 0 OR age > 120)

Description: Checks that gender values are within expected domain (e.g., Male, Female, Other), identifying invalid entries.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NOT NULL AND gender NOT IN ('Male','Female','Other')

Description: Checks that status values are within expected domain (e.g., Active, Inactive, Suspended), identifying invalid statuses.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NOT NULL AND status NOT IN ('Active','Inactive','Suspended')

Description: Detects email_address values that do not match a basic email format, indicating possible data entry errors.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL AND email_address !~* '^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\.[A-Za-z]{2,}$'

Description: Checks that phone_number values contain only digits, spaces, plus, hyphens, or parentheses, indicating valid phone formats.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND phone_number !~* '^[0-9+\-\(\) ]+$'

Description: Ensures that created_on timestamp is not after modified_on, which would indicate logical inconsistency in record history.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NOT NULL AND modified_on IS NOT NULL AND created_on > modified_on

Description: Checks that age value matches the difference between current date and date_of_birth, identifying calculation inconsistencies.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NOT NULL AND date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND age <> EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AGE(date_of_birth))

Description: Checks for account_numbers values that are empty strings, indicating missing account linkage.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers = ''

Description: Ensures that created_on timestamp is not in the future, which would indicate data entry errors.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NOT NULL AND created_on > NOW()

Description: Ensures that modified_on timestamp is not in the future, which would indicate data entry errors.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NOT NULL AND modified_on > NOW()
